column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I ordered the 9" pizza because I'm a hungry girl. The single probably would have been sufficient. They pride themselves on Wisconsin mozzarella and California tomatoes for the sauce. There was a nice sweetness to both
column2: and the crust was crisp on the bottom yet doughy. I thought the crust could have been more buttery and lacked salt. They put the cheese on top of the crust
column3: what we call an "upside down slice" in New York. That is followed by lean sausage
column4: and then tomato sauce on top. It was tasty.
